name: Dokonj? Gaeru: The Mahjong
description:
Dokonj? Gaeru: The Mahjong is a traditional Mahjong game based on the manga written by Yasumi Yoshizawa.

The game can be played either in a story mode or a free play versus mode. In the former, the game follows the titular character and his advice giving frog t-shirt through a series of matches with story events in between. In versus mode, the player gets to pick a character to play as and 3 opponents to play against.

Aside from the game itself, there is a detailed menu explaining all of the rules of Mahjong so that inexperienced players can learn how to play before they start the game.

shot.caption: Some story leading up to the first game.
Each player's monetary situation is shown before the game.
The character selection screen in versus mode. More characters can be unlocked as the player progresses through the game.
